alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Mason; Putnam; Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 12:24PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northeastern Boyd, southeastern Gallia, southeastern Lawrence, southwestern Mason, northern Cabell, west central Putnam and northwestern Wayne Counties through 100 PM EST... At 1223 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Coal Grove, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Ashland, Point Pleasant, Coal Grove, Chesapeake, Proctorville, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, South Point, Burlington, Aid, Westwood, Crown City, Athalia, Henderson, Scottown, Ashton, Gallopolis Ferry and Green Bottom. This includes the following highways... Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 190 and 191. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
